main event: On the evening of 8 February 1967, multiple witnesses reported seeing bright, red and white glowing objects in the sky near Bourbon, Missouri.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving up and down and hovering for periods before disappearing., Witnesses described seeing a total of at least four objects that were large and bright., The objects emitted no distinctive sound and left no physical evidence., Several individuals reported seeing the unidentified objects over a span of several months., One witness described a strange odor of ozone and unusual behavior in pets during sightings.
sighted object: bright, red and white glowing objects
witness description: various residents including a housewife, a saleslady, a waitress, and a minister
